original_text: For everything created by God is good, and nothing is to be rejected if it is received with thanksgiving,
korean_text: 하나님께서 지으신 모든 것이 선하매 감사함으로 받으면 버릴 것이 없나니

sentences.original_text: For everything created by God is good
and nothing is to be rejected
if it is received with thanksgiving
